verses.verse: Then <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H802>harlot,<s%> <S%H2181><s%> and went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her.

And it was told the <S%H5841>Gazites,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H2008>hither.<s%> And they <S%H5437>compassed<s%> him in, and laid <S%H693>wait<s%> for him <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and were <S%H2790>quiet<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> In the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H5704>when<s%> it is <S%H216>day,<s%> we shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> him.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H2677>midnight,<s%> <S%H3915><s%> and <S%H6965>arose<s%> at <S%H2677>midnight,<s%> <S%H3915><s%> and <S%H270>took<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>posts,<s%> and went <S%H5265>away<s%> with them, bar and <S%H5973>all,<s%> <S%H1280><s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> them <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3802>shoulders,<s%> and carried them <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> <S%H310>afterward,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> that he <S%H157>loved<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H7796>Sorek,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1807>Delilah.<s%>

And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, <S%H6601>Entice<s%> him, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>wherein<s%> his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> lieth, and by <S%H4100>what<s%> means we may <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against him, that we may <S%H631>bind<s%> him to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him: and <S%H587>we<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> thee every <S%H376>one<s%> of us eleven <S%H505>hundred<s%> <S%H3967><s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H4100>wherein<s%> thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> lieth, and <S%H4100>wherewith<s%> thou mightest be <S%H631>bound<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> thee.

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H518>If<s%> they <S%H631>bind<s%> me with <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3499>withes<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H2717>dried,<s%> then shall I be <S%H2470>weak,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H120>man.<s%>

Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> to her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3499>withes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H2717>dried,<s%> and she <S%H631>bound<s%> him with them.

Now there were men lying in <S%H693>wait,<s%> <S%H3427>abiding<s%> with her in the <S%H2315>chamber.<s%> And she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> be <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, <S%H8123>Samson.<s%> And he <S%H5423>broke<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3499>withes,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> a <S%H6616>thread<s%> of <S%H5296>tow<s%> is <S%H5423>broken<s%> when it <S%H7306>toucheth<s%> the <S%H784>fire.<s%> So his <S%H3581>strength<s%> was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known.<s%>

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> thou hast <S%H2048>mocked<s%> me, and <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H413><s%> me <S%H3577>lies:<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H4100>wherewith<s%> thou mightest be <S%H631>bound.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H518>If<s%> they bind me <S%H631>fast<s%> <S%H631><s%> with <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H3808>never<s%> were <S%H6213>occupied,<s%> <S%H4399><s%> then shall I be <S%H2470>weak,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H120>man.<s%>

Delilah <S%H1807><s%> therefore <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him therewith, and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> be <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, <S%H8123>Samson.<s%> And there were liers in <S%H693>wait<s%> <S%H3427>abiding<s%> in the <S%H2315>chamber.<s%> And he <S%H5423>broke<s%> them from <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H2220>arms<s%> like a <S%H2339>thread.<s%>

And <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> <S%H5704>Hitherto<s%> <S%H2008><s%> thou hast <S%H2048>mocked<s%> me, and <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H413><s%> me <S%H3576>lies:<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H4100>wherewith<s%> thou mightest be <S%H631>bound.<s%> And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, <S%H518>If<s%> thou <S%H707>weavest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H4545>web.<s%>

And she <S%H8628>fastened<s%> it with the <S%H3489>pin,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> be <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, <S%H8123>Samson.<s%> And he <S%H3364>awaked<s%> out of his <S%H4480>sleep,<s%> <S%H8142><s%> and went <S%H5265>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> with the <S%H3489>pin<s%> of the <S%H708>beam,<s%> and with the <S%H4545>web.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H349>How<s%> canst thou <S%H559>say,<s%> I <S%H157>love<s%> thee, when thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me? thou hast <S%H2048>mocked<s%> me these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and hast <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> me <S%H4100>wherein<s%> thy <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> lieth.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> she <S%H6693>pressed<s%> him <S%H3605>daily<s%> <S%H3117><s%> with her <S%H1697>words,<s%> and <S%H509>urged<s%> him, so that his <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H7114>vexed<s%> unto <S%H4191>death;<s%>

That he <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H853>her<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, There hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> a <S%H4177>razor<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> mine <S%H7218>head;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> have been a <S%H5139>Nazarite<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> from my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H4480>womb:<s%> <S%H990><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> I be <S%H1548>shaven,<s%> then my <S%H3581>strength<s%> will <S%H5493>go<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> me, and I shall become <S%H2470>weak,<s%> and <S%H1961>be<s%> like <S%H3605>any<s%> other <S%H120>man.<s%>

And when <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he had <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H853>her<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Come <S%H5927>up<s%> this <S%H6471>once,<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he hath <S%H5046>showed<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H3820>heart.<s%> Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> her, and <S%H5927>brought<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And she made him <S%H3462>sleep<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H1290>knees;<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H376>man,<s%> and she caused him to shave <S%H1548>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of his <S%H7218>head;<s%> and she <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him, and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5493>went<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him.

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> be <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, <S%H8123>Samson.<s%> And he <S%H3364>awoke<s%> out of his <S%H4480>sleep,<s%> <S%H8142><s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I will go <S%H3318>out<s%> as at other times <S%H6471>before,<s%> <S%H6471><s%> and shake <S%H5287>myself.<s%> And <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H5493>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him.

But the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H270>took<s%> him, and put <S%H5365>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with fetters of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> and he <S%H1961>did<s%> <S%H2912>grind<s%> in the <S%H615>prison<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
Howbeit the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to grow <S%H6779>again<s%> <S%H834>after<s%> he was <S%H1548>shaven.<s%>

Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered them <S%H622>together<s%> for to <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> their <S%H430>god,<s%> and to <S%H8057>rejoice:<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> Our <S%H430>god<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> our <S%H341>enemy<s%> into our <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, they <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H430>god:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> Our <S%H430>god<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H341>enemy,<s%> and the <S%H2717>destroyer<s%> of our <S%H776>country,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> slew <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2491><s%> of us.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> were <S%H2896>merry,<s%> that they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> that he may make us <S%H7832>sport.<s%> And they <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson<s%> out of the prison <S%H4480>house;<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H615><s%> and he made them <S%H6711>sport:<s%> <S%H6440><s%> and they <S%H5975>set<s%> him <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5288>lad<s%> that <S%H2388>held<s%> him by the <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H5117>Suffer<s%> me that I may <S%H4184>feel<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H834>whereupon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>standeth,<s%> that I may <S%H8172>lean<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.

Now the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H8033>there;<s%> and there were <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1406>roof<s%> about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> that <S%H7200>beheld<s%> while <S%H8123>Samson<s%> made <S%H7832>sport.<s%>

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6471>once,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> that I may be at once <S%H5358>avenged<s%> <S%H5359><s%> <S%H259><s%> of the <S%H4480>Philistines<s%> <S%H6430><s%> for my <S%H4480>two<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> took <S%H3943>hold<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>stood,<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> which it was borne <S%H5564>up,<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> with his right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and of the <S%H259>other<s%> with his <S%H8040>left.<s%>

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let <S%H5315>me<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%> And he <S%H5186>bowed<s%> himself with all his <S%H3581>might;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H5633>lords,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were therein. So the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H4191>slew<s%> at his <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H7227>more<s%> than they <S%H4480>which<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H4191>slew<s%> in his <S%H2416>life.<s%>

Then his <S%H251>brethren<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> came <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> him, and brought him <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%> in the burial <S%H6913>place<s%> of <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%> And <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
